name: Planet of Tanks
description:
My 2. game that i work on in my spare time.

Planet of Tanks is a Top-Down multiplayer tank shooter where the name is not inspired by anything at all.

I will probably try to update a lot in the future.

PS. How to find your IP-address: press windows + r, type cmd, in the new window type ipconfig, your IP-address is under IPv4.

PS. I did not make the textures, a friend of mine did.
